data.title: Killer Robots Considered Harmful
data.speaker: Laura Nolan
data.bio: Laura Nolan is a software engineer who focuses on software operations and reliability. She holds degrees in Computer Science and in Ethics, and is currently completing another MA in Strategic Studies. Since 2018, Laura has been part of the Campaign to Stop Killer Robots, an umbrella organisation of NGOs that works towards a legally-binding instrument to regulate autonomous weapons.
data.subtitle: not a killer robot
